name: "Sixteen Candles" Trivia Questions Online Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Molly Ringwald.

	Molly Ringwald is the ultimate '80s teen icon.  She also starred in other popular '80s flicks such as "The Breakfast Club" and "Pretty in Pink".

questions.text: Which class did Samantha take the sex ed test in?
questions.explanation:
Independent Study.

	If you will recall she took the test and was supposed to pass it to her friend Randy, but Jake ended up with it instead.

questions.text: What is the name of the foreign exchange student that is staying with Grandma and Grandpa Baker?
questions.explanation:
Long Duk Dong.

	Gedde Wantanabe portrayed this lovable character.  He can most recently be seen in a recurring role on "ER" as a nurse, Yosh.

questions.text: What color of Trans Am did Sam want for her birthday?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	She wanted a black Trans Am and pink guy.

Caroline Mulford.

	Haviland Morris who played Caroline can also be seen in small parts of "Who's That Girl" and "Gremlin 2: The New Batch".

Anthony Michael Hall.

	Anthony Michael Hall is also another icon from the '80s.  He also starred in films such as "The Breakfast Club", "Vacation", "Weird Science" and "Johnny Be Good".

questions.text: What did Rudy's mother say that he would no longer be able to take part in after he married Ginny?
questions.correct: the girl of the month club
options: having two or three girlfriends at a time
questions.explanation:
the girl of the month club.

	He says he can look but not touch.

questions.text: What was the name of the girl that Long Duk Dong danced with at the dance?
questions.explanation:
Marlene.

	She could run the 40 yard dash in five seconds flat.

questions.text: Which of the following was a tagline for this film?
questions.correct: It is the time of your life that may last a lifetime
options: She's young, she's in love, and she's sixteen
Her parents forgot her sixteenth birthday
You only have your sixteenth birthday once
questions.explanation:
It is the time of your life that may last a lifetime.

	This film was written and directed by John Hughes and was released in America in 1984.  This was his first film that he directed.

questions.text: Which actress played Samantha's mother Brenda Baker?
questions.explanation:
Carlin Glynn.

	Carlin is the mother of actress Mary Stuart Masterson.  She can also be seen in "The Trip to Bountiful" and "Gardens of Stone".
